item.title: Luanne HTB Writeup
Time HTB Writeup
item.description: Enumeration: Nmap scan: let’s checkout the running web server: its a java beautifier and validator. lets check the source code: nothing interesting in the source code let’s search for hidden directories: $ python3 dirsearch.py -u http://10.10.10.223/ -e txt,html,php,log,zip,bac,bak,tar

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Hello, this is my first post. And this is some Bla Bla.

item.title: Duckuino
item.description: It came to my mind to make a rubber ducky using arduino uno which i already have .. so let’s get started. Rubber Ducky is used to perform HID attacks » search it out. Arduino Uno has a chip “Atmegau16u2” or “8u2”, But mine is Arduino Uno R3 with Atmega16u2 chip. The ATmega16U2 chip on your Arduino board acts as a bridge between the computer’s USB port and the main processor’s serial port.
